rows.label: qev013301_MSG0001
rows.name:
There you are! Finally!
I've been looking all over for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0002
rows.name:
With Corwin gone, you're the only one left
who can help...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0003
rows.name: Please, help me save my team![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_JNK0010
rows.name: Query[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Raleigh to first explain what happened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_JNK0020
rows.name: Assist[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_SEL0021
rows.name: Agree to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0004
rows.name:
R-right! Sorry. I need to learn to stay calm like you.
Let me explain...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0005
rows.name:
Without even knowing what happened? Wow, you're
something else! Thank you so much. I knew I made
the right call asking you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0006
rows.name:
And sorry—I got a little ahead of myself there.
I'll explain from the beginning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0007
rows.name:
That black Skell has been targeting members of
Corwin's team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0008
rows.name:
We've lost contact with a number of BLADEs now who
never made it back to the city...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0009
rows.name:
So Corwin put together a rescue team with himself at
the lead, and they left New LA a while ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0010
rows.name:
But now they've all gone dark as well, and I'm the only
member of the team left![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0011
rows.name:
I was pretty much panicking, but then I suddenly
remembered you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_JNK0030
rows.name: Appreciate[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_SEL0031
rows.name: Show gratitude for Raleigh's kind words.

rows.label: qev013301_JNK0040
rows.name: Gripe[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_SEL0041
rows.name:
Complain that Raleigh only remembers
you when it's convenient.

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0012
rows.name:
Considering the skill you've displayed thus far...
Well, that's not something I'd easily forget.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0013
rows.name: So please...save my team. I beg you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0014
rows.name:
You're right. I'm sorry. And I know someone of your
skill must be incredibly busy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0015
rows.name:
I also know I should feel ashamed for begging another
BLADE operative for help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0016
rows.name:
But I have to protect my team, and if begging is what
it takes, then so be it. Please help! Pleeeeeeeease![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0017
rows.name: I knew you'd agree. Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0018
rows.name:
First, I need you to go help Peter's group.
They went missing over in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0019
rows.name:
I'll get to work on pinpointing the others and call you
as soon as I know more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0020
rows.name: And if you see a black Skell...be careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0021
rows.name:
That one machine is responsible for downing most
of the Skell pilots in Corwin's crew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_JNK0050
rows.name: Boast[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_SEL0051
rows.name: Assure Raleigh that you can take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_JNK0060
rows.name: Agree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Raleigh you'll avoid it if possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0022
rows.name:
It's weird. Coming from you, that doesn't sound like
bravado. I almost feel like I can finally stop worrying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0023
rows.name:
Good. Though I get the feeling you'd manage to come
out on top anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0024
rows.name: I'm counting on you. I know you can do this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0025
rows.name:
Corwin should be somewhere in Sylvalum.
Please help him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0030
rows.name:
I never thought I'd see their faces again.
Thank you, [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0031
rows.name:
What you brought home was priceless—I only wish this
reward had anywhere near as much value.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0032
rows.name:
We lost a lot of good BLADEs, but Corwin and I won't
stop until we rebuild the team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0033
rows.name:
Good luck to you and the other members of Elma's
team. I'm sure there are plenty of others depending
on you as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0026
rows.name: Bates...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0027
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0028
rows.name:
...No. I need to focus on what comes next.
There'll be time for mourning after.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0029
rows.name:
Corwin should be somewhere in Sylvalum.
Please help him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0034
rows.name:
Wait, where's Corwin? Did you not come
back together?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_JNK0070
rows.name: Apologize[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_SEL0071
rows.name: Take responsibility for Corwin's death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_JNK0080
rows.name: Evade[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Raleigh that Corwin's death was not your fault.

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0035
rows.name:
No, you have nothing to apologize for. Though I know
that won't stop you from feeling responsible...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0036
rows.name:
But please, don't blame yourself. If there's fault here,
it's mine. I'm the one who sat here doing nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0037
rows.name:
Corwin... How could this happen...
This is all my fault...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0038
rows.name:
Th-then he's... I mean, no. I'm sorry...
I'm sure you did all you could.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0039
rows.name: It's true, it's not your fault at all...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0040
rows.name:
I'm the one who sat here doing nothing.
This is MY fault...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0041
rows.name:
S-sorry... I still can't even think straight.
It's all just...too raw...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0042
rows.name:
Bates and I and all the others joined up because of
Corwin. He was this...beacon. And now he's gone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013301_MSG0043
rows.name:
...Oh, I'm sorry. Here's your reward.
Thank you for all you've done.[ST:wait ]
